JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Introduction

Skuden is a small restaurant placed in southern Denmark placed at the waterfront, with 40 seats. We do parties where we close the restaurant for the party. So we are small, but cozy :)

We are not set on a certain style and we change the menu once every 3rd month + a few changes during that period. Only lunch and dinner is served. 

You will on the daily be alone in the kitchen - during busy hours you will have an assistant. 

During high season (May/June - August) there will be 2 chefs and 2 assistants. 

January we are closed down. 

Your tasks

We are looking for a chef, that can manage the daily functions of the kitchen, in close dialog with the manager. 

Your responsebilities will be:

·         Menu planning

·         Continue to evolve the kitchen

·         Self-regulation (state mandatory cleaning schedule etc.)

·         Order goods and maintain the kitchen

.         Daily cleaning of the kitchen area

Your profile

You will be given great freedom to work and the posibility to become selfsufficient.
We hope for a long term cooparation. 

You are / want:

·         A trained chef

·         A proffesional and can keep your cool when busy

·         To be given new challenges

.         A European citizen or have a Danish work permit

Benefits

We can offer

·         A young and energetic team

·         A steady schedule

·         40 hour work week

·         3 days off a week

·         A lot of cool events during the year

·         The possibility of accomodation

Introduction

Skuden is a small restaurant placed in southern Denmark placed at the waterfront, with 40 seats. We do parties where we close the restaurant for the party. So we are small, but cozy :)

We are not set on a certain style and we change the menu once every 3rd month + a few changes during that period. Only lunch and dinner is served. 

You will on the daily be alone in the kitchen - during busy hours you will have an assistant. 

During high season (May/June - August) there will be 2 chefs and 2 assistants. 

January we are closed down. 

Your tasks

We are looking for a chef, that can manage the daily functions of the kitchen, in close dialog with the manager. 

Your responsebilities will be:

·         Menu planning

·         Continue to evolve the kitchen

·         Self-regulation (state mandatory cleaning schedule etc.)

·         Order goods and maintain the kitchen

.         Daily cleaning of the kitchen area

Your profile

You will be given great freedom to work and the posibility to become selfsufficient.
We hope for a long term cooparation. 

You are / want:

·         A trained chef

·         A proffesional and can keep your cool when busy

·         To be given new challenges

.         A European citizen or have a Danish work permit
